readme:
## Automate Digital Delivery After PayPal Purchase Using n8n

### A Complete Step-by-Step Guide to Seamless Template Delivery

#### Built by Amjid Ali ‚Äì SyncBricks

Deliver personalized files instantly after PayPal transactions using n8n ‚Äì without writing a single backend line.

* * *

## üöÄ What This n8n Workflow Does

This automation template helps you automatically deliver a digital product (such as an n8n template or JSON file) to customers who pay via PayPal ‚Äî within seconds.

### You can:

  * Automatically extract customer info
  * Identify what was purchased
  * Send a clean, branded email with the product file
  * Promote your other courses, books, and tools



* * *

## üì¶ Use Case

### Example Product: [AI-Powered Social Media Content Generator & Publisher](https://www.paypal.com/ncp/payment/8CG259Q744FT4)

When a customer buys this product through [PayPal](https://www.paypal.com/ncp/payment/8CG259Q744FT4), this automation:

  * Listens for a successful payment event
  * Fetches order details via API
  * Sends an HTML email with the template attached
  * Promotes your other offerings with embedded links



* * *

## üîß Prerequisites

You‚Äôll need:

  * An [n8n instance](https://n8n.syncbricks.com/) (self-hosted or n8n Cloud)
  * A PayPal developer account
  * PayPal OAuth2 credentials configured in n8n
  * Your product hosted as a downloadable `.json` file (Oracle, Dropbox, GitHub, etc.)
  * SMTP email credentials in n8n



* * *

## üß† Step-by-Step Setup

### 1\. Webhook Trigger

**Node:** Webhook  
Listens for a POST request from PayPal‚Äôs webhook for `PAYMENT.CAPTURE.COMPLETED` events.  
üìå Add the webhook to your PayPal Developer App > Webhooks.

### 2\. Wait

**Node:** Wait  
Adds a brief delay to ensure the payment is completely processed before continuing.

### 3\. Filter Event Type

**Node:** Switch  
Processes only when the event is `PAYMENT.CAPTURE.COMPLETED`.

### 4\. Fetch Order Details

**Node:** HTTP Request  
Retrieves the order information from PayPal's Orders API.  
**URL format:**  
`https://api.paypal.com/v2/checkout/orders/{{ order_id }}`

### 5\. Extract Email & Product Info

**Node:** Set  
Extracts first name, last name, email address, and the purchased item name.

### 6\. Identify Product Purchased

**Node:** Switch  
Checks if the product is ‚ÄúAI-Powered Social Media Content Generator & Publisher‚Äù.

### 7\. Download Workflow File

**Node:** HTTP Request  
Fetches the hosted workflow JSON from object storage (Oracle in this case).

### 8\. Convert to Downloadable File

**Node:** Code  
Converts the JSON content into a binary file and attaches it.

### 9\. Send Custom Email

**Node:** Send Email  
Sends a rich HTML email to the buyer with:

  * Their name
  * The file attachment
  * Product name
  * Helpful resource links: 
    * üìò [Mastering n8n Course on Udemy](https://www.udemy.com/course/mastering-n8n-ai-agents-api-automation-webhooks-no-code/?referralCode=0309FD70BE2D72630C09)
    * üìñ [Step-by-Step Guide (n8n Book)](https://lms.syncbricks.com/books/n8n)
    * üéì [n8n Video Tutorials (Free Course)](https://lms.syncbricks.com/courses/n8n)
    * ‚òÅÔ∏è [Sign up for n8n Cloud](https://n8n.syncbricks.com) ‚Äì Use code `AMJID10`
    * üé• [YouTube Video Walkthrough](https://www.youtube.com/@syncbricks)



* * *

## üìö Additional Learning Resources

### üöÄ My Full Automation Suite

Explore more and master n8n with these resources:

  * üéì [Mastering n8n (Full Udemy Course)](https://www.udemy.com/course/mastering-n8n-ai-agents-api-automation-webhooks-no-code/?referralCode=0309FD70BE2D72630C09)
  * üìï [Get Your Step-by-Step Guide (n8n Book)](https://lms.syncbricks.com/books/n8n)
  * üé• [Get Step-by-Step Tutorials (Video Course)](https://lms.syncbricks.com/courses/n8n)
  * ‚òÅÔ∏è [Sign up for n8n Cloud](https://n8n.syncbricks.com)
  * üí° [Templates, Tools, and More](https://syncbricks.com)
  * üì∫ [YouTube Channel ‚Äì SyncBricks](https://youtube.com/@syncbricks)



* * *

## üôã Need Help or Customization?

Reach out!  
Email: [amjid@amjidali.com](mailto:amjid@amjidali.com)  
LinkedIn: [linkedin.com/in/amjidali](https://linkedin.com/in/amjidali)  
Website: [syncbricks.com](https://syncbricks.com)
